attributes.action: Smarten up on Government administration errors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The amount of errors across all government departments is unacceptable and causes great stress to individuals involved. The more recent events over child benefit data being lost is as bad as my data being posted to the wrong address through department errors. Please make sure that our personal data is treated as if it was your personal data.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
